Text.Page:
Take care of the {@LinkCreature:25#3011#consecrated Lokians}, {@LinkCreature:25#3012#shurian champions}, {@LinkCreature:25#3021#primal Lokians}, {@LinkCreature:25#3022#shurian magisters}, {@LinkCreature:25#3031#primal Lokian darkweavers}, and {@LinkCreature:25#3032#hallowed Lokian knights} in the Dark Cathedral.

I think that might about cover it, actually.

Karus is going to be your contact when you're all finished up.
Another fight well fought. Fates be damned, you're good.
Rightâ€”you're going to take out all of those cultists? I know what they say about you, but I'll believe it when I see the cores.
